title: Template for presentations
text:
make up an X variable
yintercept <- 4

title: Template for presentations
text:
calculate the average
yintercept <- 4
slope <- 1.3
obs_error <- .5
x <- runif(200, min = -1, max = 1)
y_mean <- yintercept + slope * x

title: Template for presentations
text:
simulate some observations

yintercept <- 4
slope <- 1.3
obs_error <- .5
x <- runif(200, min = -1, max = 1)
y_mean <- yintercept + slope * x
y_obs <- rnorm(200, mean = y_mean, sd = obs_error)

title: Template for presentations
section: here it is all on one slide
text:
here it is all on one slide


yintercept <- 4
slope <- 1.3
obs_error <- .5
x <- runif(200, min = -1, max = 1)
y_mean <- yintercept + slope * x
y_obs <- rnorm(200, mean = y_mean, sd = obs_error)
plot(y_obs, x)

title: Template for presentations
section: Or we can present the code and results separately
text:
Or we can present the code and results separately

The codeThe figure



yintercept <- 4
slope <- 1.3
obs_error <- .5
x <- runif(200, min = -1, max = 1)
y_mean <- yintercept + slope * x
y_obs <- rnorm(200, mean = y_mean, sd = obs_error)




plot(y_obs ~ x)
